text: Pen ensel anɨb ak yɨp agak, Takaw anɨb ak takaw yepɨs mel, nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agak. Nɨŋɨd dɨnɨgel agak. God Bɨawl, Kawnan ne bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok kɨlop gos ñek takaw agelɨgɨpal ak, ne ensel anop agyokak. Agyokek, binɨb God nop wog gɨñeb okok kɨlop, wulep mɨdeb gɨnɨgab takaw ak agñɨnɨg owup agak.
